title: Venus Transit in the 2nd House: Value, Voice, and Wealth Balance
summary: With Venus transiting your 2nd house as a Capricorn Ascendant, focus shifts to values, finances, and speech. This period enhances your ability to earn through refined skills, polite communication, and trusted networks. Family bonds and emotional security gain importance, while material choices lean toward quality over excess. Venus here supports financial stability through patience and discipline, yet cautions against comfort-based spending. When ethics align with earnings, this transit strengthens both wealth and self-worth in a steady, lasting way.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Calm and pleasant speech gains influence

sections.title: Career
points: Favorable for finance, design, or advisory roles

closing: Venus in the 2nd house teaches that true wealth grows when values, voice, and money move in harmony.
